channel.title: Journal Article on HPCAT
channel.description: Recent content in Journal Article on HPCAT

item.title: Dr. Louri and his Research Team have published an IEEE Transactions Article titled: “Sustainability in Network-on-Chips by Exploring Heterogeneity in Emerging Technologies”
item.description: Professor Ahmed Louri and his research team (A. Sikder, A. Kodi, S. Kaya, D. Carbaugh, S. Laha, A. Louri, H. Xin and J. Wu) have published a journal article that explores heterogeneity in emerging technologies in order to enhance sustainability of Network-on-Chips. The paper titled “Sustainability in Network-on-Chips by Exploring Heterogeneity in Emerging Technologies” will appear in IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Computing in 2018. This research was sponsored by the National Science Foundation.
